root: ^It is nice to spend more time with you again.
^Last time we were together, I said that I was fine and that I trusted my house. The truth is, neither of those statements were true.
^I thought I just proved that your house was innocent after all?
^Of these magic crimes, you did indeed. However, while my house may be innocent, I still do not believe I fully support their ideology.
^Well, our house claims to be exemplary in humility, but I do not believe that to be true.
^My house is too caught up in it's own honor that it has not considered the needs of the people.
^There are people in House Ivy who have been born in poverty, and our leaders do nothing to help them. They have no opportunities to grow, and so they remain poor.
^Some may be the most talented in any certain field, but we will never truly know. My house is too focused on their own esteem to consider the true needs of the people.
^That's why I have not joined any of the houses.
^I have sworn to be professional regardless of my emotions. But I worry that not doing so would be negligent.
^Know that I will support your with whatever your needs may be.
^I know. And I thank you for your support. I admire you greatly.
^I will not leave my house immediately. I wish to expose their negligence before I leave.
^I will. But when I do leave, I was wondering...

s: ^Until you can afford your own place.

OFCOURSEYOUCAN: ^Of course you may live with me. You are always welcome here.
^Do not thank me. I would enjoy spending more time with you.
UNTILYOUCANAFFORDYOUROWNPLACE: ^I would be happy to support you until you can afford your own place.
^I could even help you find a job.
^No worries. I'm always happy to help.
